title: Unprotected FTP Access
description: An FTP server has been set up without proper security controls, and a flag has been left on the server.
hints: Try connecting to the FTP server using an FTP client.
The credentials might be default or very simple.
Check for files that are not usually there, like a flag file.
learningObjectives: Understand basic FTP setup and misconfigurations
Learn to exploit weak FTP access controls
Practice retrieving sensitive data from a server
